metadata.synopsis: This occurs if Lorin survived the fight with the hag. He is dazed and out of it. This is the victim who first say the player as a mind flayer and freaked out. 1) In scenario one, he was never summoned by the hag2) He was summoned and attacked the player and saw the player turn into a mindflayer3) He was summoned and attacked the player but never saw the player as a mind flayer
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Talk with Lorin. and skip the dialogue.4. SetGlobalOsirisFlag HAG_Hag_State_IsDead5. Talk with Lorin again.RECON  : SetGlobalOsirisFlag HAG_Hag_State_IsDead ACTION  :Talk with Lorin again.

47.speaker: Lorin
47.text: Is the hag gone? Gods, tell me she's gone. Oh, please.
47.context: NodeContext: You're lucid and coherent but terrified - looking around you for the hag.

61.speaker: Player
61.context: NodeContext: Almost not speaking to the player. You mind is flashing back to the den of horrors that was the hag's lair, and the torments you suffered at her hands.

51.speaker: Player
51.context: NodeContext: Almost not speaking to the player. You mind is flashing back to the den of horrors that was the hag's lair, and the torments you suffered at her hands.

49.speaker: Lorin
49.text: The things she did - the things she made me do.
49.context: NodeContext: Almost not speaking to the player. You mind is flashing back to the den of horrors that was the hag's lair, and the torments you suffered at her hands.

5.speaker: Lorin
5.context: NodeContext: Absolute horror as you recognise the player as the monster you saw before. Lean back eyes wide and terrified.

4.speaker: Lorin
4.text: You - you're the one. The mind flayer.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Not if I can help it. Can you still see it?
44.context: NodeContext: You're describing your vision. You flee at the end of this scene. Horror mounting as you recall the player - butchering everyone in their path

29.speaker: Lorin
29.text: No - the hag's 'gift' is gone but it's - it's going to happen. Soon.
29.context: NodeContext: You're describing your vision. You flee at the end of this scene. Horror mounting as you recall the player - butchering everyone in their path

20.speaker: Lorin
20.text: I saw you screaming - covered in your own insides as that - that thing bursts out of your skull.
20.context: NodeContext: You sound traumatised here as you mind flashes back to the player, skin peeling, vomiting their insides as they transform into a murderous killing machine.

13.speaker: Lorin
13.text: You change, skin ripping from your body and then you butcher... everyone. Everyone around you.
13.context: NodeContext: This is a big moment - you've just confirmed the player's worst fears. You sound utterly horrified, almost dazed, as you finish describing the scene.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Be specific. When will this happen?

27.speaker: Lorin
27.text: I - I don't know. It could be a tenday.

1.speaker: Lorin
1.text: I can't do this. You're too dangerous. I'm - I'm sorry.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Why should I trust you? Or the hag's magic?

7.speaker: Lorin
7.text: Hag magic it might be, but it's never been wrong. Not once.

15.speaker: Lorin
15.text: I can't stay. You're too dangerous. But I hope... I only hope it's a quick death.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I butcher everyone? That sounds delightful.

37.speaker: Lorin
37.text: Death can't come quick enough for you - monster.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I have no idea what you're talking about.
39.context: NodeContext: You're describing your vision. You flee at the end of this scene. Horror mounting as you recall the player - butchering everyone in their path.

28.speaker: Lorin
28.text: No. I saw it. You're covered in blood and gore - vomiting. And then... your skull splits open.
28.context: NodeContext: You're describing your vision. You flee at the end of this scene. Horror mounting as you recall the player - butchering everyone in their path.

52.speaker: Lorin
52.text: That thing bursts out of you and you're - you're screaming.
52.context: NodeContext: You sound traumatised here as you mind flashes back to the player, skin peeling, vomiting their insides as they transform into a murderous killing machine.

12.speaker: Lorin
12.text: I still hear it. Still see your eyes go dead, and you... you butcher them. Everyone around you.
12.context: NodeContext: This is a big moment - you've just confirmed the player's worst fears. You sound utterly horrified, almost dazed, as you finish describing the scene.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: I saved your life. Be grateful.
16.context: NodeContext: You're describing your vision. Pleading as you struggle to explain the player's future to them. Horror mounting.

0.speaker: Lorin
0.text: No. You don't understand. You kill them.
0.context: NodeContext: You're describing your vision. Pleading as you struggle to explain the player's future to them. Horror mounting.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Say that again, and I'll rip your throat out with my teeth.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Shut your damn mouth. And never call me that again.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: You're lucky to be alive. I could have killed you.
45.context: NodeContext: Player has said you're lucky to be alive. You attacked the player against your will but they knocked you out -saving your life. You're still horrified - the hag probably planned for you to die that way.

62.speaker: Lorin
62.text: That damn shrew would have loved it. Would have loved watching you murder me.
62.context: NodeContext: Player has said you're lucky to be alive. You attacked the player against your will but they knocked you out -saving your life. You're still horrified - the hag probably planned for you to die that way.

33.speaker: Player
33.context: NodeContext: The player has asked if you're all right. You look away, ashamed and broken.

34.speaker: Lorin
34.text: No. Not even a little bit.
34.context: NodeContext: The player has asked if you're all right. You look away, ashamed and broken.

18.speaker: Lorin
18.text: The hag - there's never been a more vile creature.
18.context: NodeContext: Almost not speaking to the player. You mind is flashing back to the den of horrors that was the hag's lair, and the torments you suffered at her hands.

32.speaker: Lorin
32.text: The things she did to me - the things she made me do I...

25.speaker: Player
25.context: NodeContext: Hatred and fear in your voice as you think of the hag.

14.speaker: Lorin
14.text: May she burn in the Nine Hells.
14.context: NodeContext: Hatred and fear in your voice as you think of the hag.

26.speaker: Lorin
26.text: The hag - there's never been a more vile creature. The things she did to me...

31.speaker: Player
31.context: NodeContext: Player has asked how you ended up in the hag lair. Your voice is filled with regret.

22.speaker: Player
22.context: NodeContext: Player has asked how you ended up in the hag lair. Your voice is filled with regret.

23.speaker: Lorin
23.text: I was a fool. I wanted to know my fate. I had a choice between two lives, and I was frightened of choosing wrong.
23.context: NodeContext: Player has asked how you ended up in the hag lair. Your voice is filled with regret.

46.speaker: Lorin
46.text: I asked the hag to help me see what the future would hold. Got what I wished for, too.

3.speaker: Lorin
3.text: I saw my future self - a corpse, rotten with maggots. And everyone around me dead. Putrid and dead.
3.context: NodeContext: Dazed horror as you recall the visions that pushed you to the brink of insanity.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: You mentioned choosing between two lives. What were they?
36.context: NodeContext: Your voice is filled with regret. You gave up everything because you were too afarid to make a choice.

6.speaker: Lorin
6.text: A boring story. Stay or go. Marriage and kids or a life of novelty.
6.context: NodeContext: Your voice is filled with regret. You gave up everything because you were too afarid to make a choice.

2.speaker: Lorin
2.text: I lost my best years rather than just... choose.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Leave while you can - and be careful.

42.speaker: Player
42.context: NodeContext: Hurried and subservient as you duck your head, making to leave

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Leave darthiir - before I finished what the hag started.
48.context: NodeContext: Hurried and subservient as you duck your head, making to leave

50.speaker: Lorin
50.context: NodeContext: Hurried and subservient as you duck your head, making to leave
